context.arch.service.helper
Class FunctionDescriptions

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractList<E>
          java.util.Vector<FunctionDescription>
              context.arch.service.helper.FunctionDescriptions
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<FunctionDescription>, java.util.Collection<FunctionDescription>, java.util.List<FunctionDescription>, java.util.RandomAccess
public class FunctionDescriptions
extends java.util.Vector<FunctionDescription>

This class maintains a list of function descriptions. Essentially this is a collection of multiple functions.

See Also:
FunctionDescription, Serialized Form
